title: [GAMEPLAY] Woad King Darius missing recall sound
body: Go into any game and hit your recall, it no longer has the sound effects of planting his axe in the ground

replies.body:
Hey Charles Barklius,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and get the issue resolved!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rq196t87,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-08T23:57:55.389+0000)
>
> Hey Charles Barklius,
> 
> Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and get the issue resolved!

So uh, still broken boss

Any word?

Hi, hi! 

Sorry for the delay on this one - since it was a minor issue, it has a lower priority than other issues. That said, I poked the audio bros, and it looks like the SFX should be fixed in next patch! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rq196t87,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-06T17:48:04.892+0000)
>
> Hi, hi! 
> 
> Sorry for the delay on this one - since it was a minor issue, it has a lower priority than other issues. That said, I poked the audio bros, and it looks like the SFX should be fixed in next patch! ^-^

Aight, thanks for the update

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rq196t87,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-08T23:57:55.389+0000)
>
> Hey Charles Barklius,
> 
> Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and get the issue resolved!

Glad to hear it
Sion's laugh still sometimes refuses to play for a while if you spam it

> [{quoted}](name=IronSolariLeona,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rq196t87,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-06T19:04:20.701+0000)
>
> Sion's laugh still sometimes refuses to play for a while if you spam it

All of his emotes break actually

But they've been broken for so long that I assume it's a larger issue that they don't know how to fix yet

I don't even know how to trigger it breaking
Can confirm, happened to me when I played him earlier
